name: The East New World
description: A retro-inspired action platformer game with the high quality pixel art style. Tight controls, complex level design (including multiple paths and secret areas), RPG elements, collectibles and achievements, boss fights, NPCs, a fair amount of challenge and decent number of levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Processor: 1.0 Ghz or above Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX 9.0 supported card Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any audio output

reviews.review_text: pretty good, but some of the bosses are so ♥♥♥♥ing annoying and useless hard... nearly died now 100 times on the Lava Giant. -> Uninstall
